data.title: Papa Possum's First Little Book of Satires by Papa Possum — Kickstarter
data.name: Papa Possum
data.description: The 1st book by American political satirist Papa Possum. 14 original satires in verse with accompanying illustrations and notations.

data.title: A Brooklyn Project by Kimberley Celeste Penamon — Kickstarter
data.name: Kimberley Celeste Penamon
data.description: "A Brooklyn Project" an urban book of poetry from the authors perspective of living in Farragut Projects located in Brooklyn, NYC.

data.title: A Treasure Trove of Rhyme, coffee table sized / gift quality by Mark Stellinga — Kickstarter
data.name: Mark Stellinga
data.description: Thought provoking rhyming tales, in a unique LANDSCAPE ORIENTED, HC book. A culmination of 50+ years of penning quality rhyme. 370 pgs.

data.title: Poetry Crossing, from California Poets in the Schools by Phyllis Meshulam — Kickstarter
data.name: Phyllis Meshulam
data.description: Collected lesson plans for CPitS' 50 years. Phil Levine: "All ...who love poetry are in debt to those who worked with these children."

data.title: Paper Dreams by Carlos A. Piñón — Kickstarter
data.name: Carlos A. Piñón
data.description: Paper Dreams is a collection of writings ranging from poetry to prose to playwright. I started four years ago--it's time to publish.

data.title: Return to Mykonos poetry chapbook by Iven Lourie — Kickstarter
data.name: Iven Lourie
data.description: Two sequences: Poems from a Greek Journal (1972) and Return to Mykonos (1998) with author's watercolors make up this 40-page chapbook.

data.title: Nikki's Book: Skin-Traced Constellations by Nikki Burian — Kickstarter
data.name: Nikki Burian
data.description: Putting my poetry into a book is my biggest dream. I am so close to realizing it, I can practically feel the book in my hands.

data.title: SENTENCES, Volume IV by Chris Belden — Kickstarter
data.name: Chris Belden
data.description: Prose & poetry by the inmates of Garner Correctional Institution, a maximum security prison in Connecticut.

data.title: Publishing My New Book: Brown Skin and the Beautiful Faith by Terry E. Carter — Kickstarter
data.name: Terry E. Carter
data.description: I'm publishing my 2nd book in a trilogy of Christian-inspired poetry. It's called "Brown Skin and the Beautiful Faith". Want to help?

data.title: January Found: A Book of Poems and Performance Scores by Michael Sikkema — Kickstarter
data.name: Michael Sikkema
data.description: January Found is a book of poems and performance pieces, many of which have been published in journals and in chapbook form.

data.title: An Island on the Page by Martha's Vineyard Poetry Society — Kickstarter
data.name: Martha's Vineyard Poetry Society
data.description: How does the heart of an island beat?  Listen through the pieces.

data.title: Andrew's Writing Haiku by Andrew Hoelscher — Kickstarter
data.name: Andrew Hoelscher
data.description: I'd like to publish a book of haiku, I just need topics for the poems and a little cash for the publishing costs.

data.title: Sixty Second Poetry — Vol. 1 by Chad Schomber — Kickstarter
data.name: Chad Schomber
data.description: Sixty Second Poetry | It only takes a minute. The goal is to think quick, let emotions flow and hopefully end up with something worth.

data.title: Condor: A Book of Poems by Sam Graebner — Kickstarter
data.name: Sam Graebner
data.description: This book encompasses my work from Spring 2011 through Winter 2013. It links creation myths and family history into personal challenges

data.title: Poetically Speaking: Stories of Love, Triumph and Struggle by Tylicee Mysreign — Kickstarter
data.name: Tylicee Mysreign
data.description: Poets, artists and photographers from Detroit come together in a stunning book to share their stories of love, triumph, and struggle

data.title: Sylvia Bowman's First Poetry Collection: We Met, Once Before by Irenicon Press @ The Writers' Workshoppe — Kickstarter
data.name: Irenicon Press @ The Writers' Workshoppe
data.description: Irenicon Press collects the short jewel-like poems of Sylvia Bowman into her first collection: We Met, Once Before.

data.title: Haikus for Gambia by IBé — Kickstarter
data.name: IBé
data.description: 49 poets, 49 haikus for Gambia! Everywhere on 2/18/14--billboards, radio, newspapers, the Internet! #Haikus4Gambia

data.title: Poetry Book - "Simple Thoughts" by Christopher Michael Ross — Kickstarter
data.name: Christopher Michael Ross
data.description: A collection of emotional, thought-provoking poetry.

data.title: Publish my Book of Poetry by jacob foy — Kickstarter
data.name: jacob foy
data.description: I'm a poet looking to self publish my first book to get started.

data.title: Is This Country? (2nd ed.) Reaching a wider audience... by Jesse David Chariton — Kickstarter
data.name: Jesse David Chariton
data.description: Is This Country?, a book of poems & lyrics, is now in a 2nd edition, and trying to reach a wider audience (i.e. more than my family).

data.title: Bohemian Pipe Dreams - Book of Poetry & Artwork by Drexel White — Kickstarter
data.name: Drexel White
data.description: Work influenced by Poe, Charles Baudelaire & Dante. Most focuses on philosophy, man's battle of good vs. evil & gothic romance.

data.title: Anthems - Poetry Collection by Jennifer Silvey — Kickstarter
data.name: Jennifer Silvey
data.description: Anthems is a poetry collection I started in grad school. It covers: dinosaurs, quantum mechanics, love, ghosts, gardens, & monsters.

data.title: Rare Historical Artifact: Poetry from China (1864-1954) by Evelyn Ch'ien — Kickstarter
data.name: Evelyn Ch'ien
data.description: This book is a collection of 600 poems written by a  diplomat (1864-1954)  who lived in China, America, Cuba, Japan and Korea.

data.title: Help Launch Police Blotter Haiku! by Jim Jones — Kickstarter
data.name: Jim Jones
data.description: The poetry of crime, in haiku form.  Hundreds of true stories of error, fear, and folly: all in one slim volume. With pictures.

data.title: Made from Concentration professional poetry by Nolan O'Malley — Kickstarter
data.name: Nolan O'Malley
data.description: I've published an e-book and need help making a professional hardcover book.  I write daily and need to expand into the market.

data.title: Publishing Prayer Poetry for those who have been there. by Annie Layer — Kickstarter
data.name: Annie Layer
data.description: I've been writing poetry since I could spell, and it is how I pray. Samples are on Facebook at Prayer Poetry.

data.title: Omissionary by Stephen Dvorak — Kickstarter
data.name: Stephen Dvorak
data.description: We're publishing my first book of poetry using alternative methods focused on helping local words reach a broader audience.

data.title: The Ends Of The Earth: Poems by Charles Bane, Jr. by Charles Bane, Jr. — Kickstarter
data.name: Charles Bane, Jr.
data.description: This will be my third collection of poetry, and deepest portion of a journey that has been marked by critical praise.

data.title: the bantership - collected poems by Harrison Parks — Kickstarter
data.name: Harrison Parks
data.description: The bantership is a series of poems I've written over the past few years that speak to the possibilities of life after tragedy.

data.title: Boston to Seattle; A Rough Landing Through Poems by Zac Burlingame — Kickstarter
data.name: Zac Burlingame
data.description: Six months ago my girlfriend and I left everything we have ever known behind in search of something better. We're still looking.

data.title: WHAT! by Micah J Beck — Kickstarter
data.name: Micah J Beck
data.description: "What!" is a collection of new poems written by Micah Beck
